 1999-09451999-05-270HERITAGE,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the PERSONS AND POSITIONS EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER (PERSONS EMPLOYED FIVE YEARS OR MORE) NO. 41 - which exempts the appointments of 78 term employees, each of whom has been employed in the same department and in the same position for five or more years, from the application of specific provisions of the Public Service Employment Act upon their assignment to a position of indeterminate duration.
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1999-0054 Publication Date: 1999-06-09
